title: is it just me or are there too many lurkers
body: I see these empty, 0 comment threads with 40+ views, and I wonder why so many views yet not a single comment from another user. Could it be underleveled accounts or new users who just see the threads but think we're an exclusive group or that we circlejerk a lot? Maybe if there were motivation to participate in the forums instead of just being advised to go to reddit, maybe then GD could revive...
